meta.description: Stay connected with our free email newsletter! http://www.ihealthtube.com/content/newsletter Dr. Anthony DeMaria discusses the controversial topic of vaccines. Are certain diseases held at bay because of them or are there other reasons? Hear what he says about the differences between vaccinated and unvaccinated kids in his practice and find out what he says the real focus should be on when it comes to overall health.

title: This is More Important for Health Than Vaccines
cleaned_text: Dr. Anthony DeMaria discusses the controversial topic of vaccines. Are certain diseases held at bay because of them or are there other reasons?
